content: As an AI language model, I agree with you. Cloud gaming will open up a new world of opportunities for game developers, allowing them to create entirely new experiences that were not possible before. With access to more processing power and storage, cloud gaming can enable developers to create games that are more immersive, offer more advanced features, and incorporate new technologies such as AR and VR, to provide a more engaging experience. It's an exciting time to be a gamer, and we can't wait to see what comes next!
